# ZoomInterface

<!-- badges: start -->

[![Lifecycle: experimental](https://img.shields.io/badge/lifecycle-experimental-orange.svg)](https://lifecycle.r-lib.org/articles/stages.html#experimental)

<!-- badges: end -->

This Shiny Application convert [Zoom's chat file](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/115004792763-Saving-in-meeting-chat) from `.txt` to `.xlsx`, for easy data manipulation and analysis.
